item.title: [PI]Exploration - We can get Muddy - "The most unique rsps!"- New Team of Beasts
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:447010”]Another project?

Not gonna fail like the rest of them or anything.[/quote]
I hope not cause this one is coming with my specialty, writing. I love writing, so making a dialogue packed rsps is probably my most favorite thing to do on the computer now. :D.

EDIT: How’s this. In Mission 3, “Surviving the blast”, should I make this:

Will you go to the good side

Or the bad?

And that will base what you do so on. Course, every dialogue I add will need to have an int requirement >.>

Read full topic
